Summary: (ref 43210, Event 3of4 djs cfi) - White starlike object, continuously illuminated, no blinking, doing a loop back path.
trends: There have been 45 other sightings in Grand Rapids
There were 3 other sightings in Grand Rapids on or around October 13th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsEvent 3 of 4 - 13Oct12 - at about 00:15, witness (A) went back outside to see if anything else was happening (ref case 43210), he was looking northeast into the sky. He saw a few meteors streaking by, but one caught his eye. The object moved from the high east, 80 degrees elevation, was streaking towards the north and down. As it came down it stopped, did a loop and went back in the direction it came from but without a streak. It was too far away for physical details and only lasted a few seconds but it was shocking. He only mentions this object because it is the reason he saw the fourth surprising event.
